original_text: And from there he went up to Penuel, and spoke to them in the same way, and the men of Penuel answered him as the men of Succoth had answered.
korean_text: 거기서 브누엘로 올라가서 그들에게도 그같이 구한즉 브누엘 사람들의 대답도 숙곳 사람들의 대답과 같은지라

sentences.original_text: And from there he went up to Penuel
and spoke to them in the same way
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 똑같은 방식으로 그들에게 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: and the men of Penuel answered him
as the men of Succoth had answered
